options.name: champion
options.description: Admin commands for managing champions.

options.name: add
options.description: Adds a new champion to the database.

options.description: Updates the images for an existing champion.

options.description: Name of the champion to update.

options.description: URL of the new primary image.

options.description: Updates the tags for an existing champion.

options.name: name
options.description: Name of the champion to update.

options.name: tags_image
options.description: URL of the new tags image.

options.description: Syncs the champion database with Google Sheets.

options.name: ability

options.name: type

options.name: type

options.name: ability
options.description: Name of the ability or immunity.

options.name: source
options.description: Source of the ability.

options.name: synergy-champions
options.description: Comma-separated list of synergy champion names to remove.

options.name: add
options.description: Add a new scheduled task for a command or message

options.name: name
options.description: Label for this schedule (e.g., 'Morning Reminder')

options.name: frequency
options.description: Frequency: daily, weekly, monthly, every

options.name: command
options.description: Command to run (e.g., /today, /exercise pullup). Leave empty if using 'message'.

options.name: message
options.description: Custom message to send (optional, overrides command if provided)

options.name: target_channel_id
options.description: Target channel ID (optional)

options.name: target_user_id
options.description: Target user ID (optional)

options.name: day
options.description: Day of week (for weekly) or day of month (for monthly)

options.name: interval
options.description: Interval for 'every' frequency, e.g. 2

options.name: unit
options.description: Unit for 'every' frequency: days, weeks

options.name: list
options.description: List all active scheduled tasks

options.name: remove
options.description: Remove a scheduled task by its ID or list number

options.name: id
options.description: ID of the schedule to remove (see /schedule list)

options.name: number
options.description: List number of the schedule to remove (see /schedule list)

name: summarize
description: Summarizes recent messages in a channel/thread.

options.name: timeframe
options.description: How far back to look (e.g., '4h', '2d', 'today', 'yesterday', 'lastweek').

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel to summarize. Defaults to current channel.

options.name: language
options.description: Language for the summary (default: English).

options.name: custom_prompt
options.description: Custom prompt for the summarization. Overrides the default prompt.

description: Commands for the Alliance War video library.
